verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] floating the idea of foreign car tariffs . Does he have any idea how many of them are manufactured in the United States ?
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: floating] [ARG1: the idea of foreign car tariffs] . Does he have any idea how many of them are manufactured in the United States ?
Donald Trump is floating the idea of foreign car tariffs . [V: Does] he have any idea how many of them are manufactured in the United States ?
Donald Trump is floating the idea of foreign car tariffs . Does [ARG0: he] [V: have] [ARG1: any idea how many of them are manufactured in the United States] ?
Donald Trump is floating the idea of foreign car tariffs . Does he have any idea how many of them [V: are] manufactured in the United States ?
Donald Trump is floating the idea of foreign car tariffs . Does he have any idea [ARG1: how many of them] are [V: manufactured] [ARGM-LOC: in the United States] ?
